verdict: EMERGENCY: $2,819 spent with ZERO conversions — entire budget is being wasted

checks.name: Conversion actions defined
checks.finding: ZERO conversions in 30 days despite 483 clicks and $2,819 spend. Either conversion tracking is broken or landing page is failing completely

checks.name: Conversion tracking functional
checks.finding: 0 conversions is a red flag — likely no conversion tracking installed, or tracking is broken. Must verify immediately

checks.name: Tag firing verification
checks.finding: No conversions recorded — tags likely not firing. Campaign is burning money blind

checks.name: Wasted spend on irrelevant terms
checks.finding: 100% of $2,819 spend is waste — ZERO conversions. Every dollar spent this month generated nothing

checks.name: Search term audit recency
checks.finding: With 0 conversions, search terms are likely poorly targeted. Urgent review needed

checks.name: Campaign naming convention
checks.finding: Complex naming: '1090 | Search No Partners | Rel 8 | CPC #2' — suggests multiple iterations without success

checks.name: Campaign count per objective
checks.finding: Single campaign but it references '#2' and 'Rel 8' suggesting many failed previous attempts

checks.name: Brand vs Non-Brand separation
checks.finding: No brand campaign. Single non-brand campaign with 0 conversions

checks.name: PMax present for eligible accounts
checks.finding: No PMax campaign — though fixing conversions must come first

checks.name: Search CTR performance
checks.finding: 7.28% CTR is decent — ads are getting clicks, the problem is post-click (landing page or tracking)

checks.name: Keyword intent alignment
checks.finding: 0 conversions with 483 clicks suggests keywords may attract wrong intent, or landing page fails to convert

checks.name: Search term quality
checks.finding: No Partners set (good) but still 0 conversions — search terms need urgent review

checks.name: CTR vs industry benchmark
checks.finding: 7.28% CTR is above average — the ad copy is working, the conversion funnel is not

checks.name: Landing page experience
checks.finding: 483 clicks, 0 conversions = 0% conversion rate. Landing page is either broken, irrelevant, or has no clear CTA

checks.name: Smart bidding strategy active
checks.finding: Campaign name references 'CPC' — likely Manual CPC with no conversion-based optimization (which makes sense given 0 conversions)

checks.name: Budget efficiency
checks.finding: $93.97/day being burned with zero return. Campaign should be paused until fundamentals are fixed

checks.name: Geographic targeting accuracy
checks.finding: Madison targeting — verify service area alignment

quickWins.action: PAUSE THE CAMPAIGN IMMEDIATELY — $2,819 wasted with 0 conversions. Stop the bleeding while diagnosis happens
Check if conversion tracking tags are installed on the website — likely broken or missing
Test the landing page — verify it loads, has clear CTA, and matches ad messaging
Review search terms report — verify queries match commercial real estate intent
Set up proper conversion tracking (phone calls + form submissions) before restarting

items: Pause the campaign immediately — every day running is ~$94 wasted
Verify conversion tracking installation — check Google Tag Assistant, GTM, or direct tag
Test landing page: load speed, mobile compatibility, clear CTA, form functionality
Review search terms for the last 30 days — identify if traffic is relevant
Install and verify conversion tracking (phone calls + form fills)
Ensure landing page has clear CTA, contact form, phone number, and matches ad messaging
Rebuild keyword list with verified commercial intent terms
Re-launch with Max Conversions bidding once tracking is confirmed working
Only increase spend once CPA is established and acceptable
Consider LSA for local commercial services
Test PMax only after Search proves concept
